code: import api from'./api';const vendaService={listarTodas:async()=>{const response=await api.get('/vendas');return response.data;},buscarPorId:async id=>{const response=await api.get("/vendas/".concat(id));return response.data;},criar:async venda=>{const response=await api.post('/vendas',venda);return response.data;}};export default vendaService;
